miniapp.name: Chord
miniapp.subtitle: Tap a tiny daily loop
miniapp.description: Chord is a tiny music mini app where you tap pads to build a simple 1 bar loop. Toggle steps, press play, and keep a different pattern for each day.
miniapp.ogDescription: Chord is a tiny music mini app where you tap pads to build a simple 1 bar loop. Toggle steps, press play, and keep a different pattern for each day.
